title: Doosan Bobcat unveils RX3 autonomous concept loader
description:
Bobcat unveiled the RX3 and other AI-powered and electric technologies at CES 2026 to simplify operations and boost jobsite productivity.

The post Doosan Bobcat unveils RX3 autonomous concept loader appeared first on The Robot Report.
